Phase module¶

The phase module contains phase processing related classes

Phase processing is generally made on small binned cubes

class orbs.phase.BinnedInterferogramCube(path, params=None, instrument=None, **kwargs)¶

Bases: orb.cube.InterferogramCube

compute_phase(path)¶

Compute binned phase cube

Parameters

path – path of the output binned phase cube.

class orbs.phase.BinnedPhaseCube(path, params=None, instrument=None, **kwargs)¶

Bases: orb.cube.Cube

get_phase(x, y)¶

Return a phase vector at position x, y

Parameters

  • x – x position

  • y – y position

iterative_polyfit(polydeg, suffix=None, high_order_phase=None)¶

Fit the cube iteratively, starting by fitting all orders, then fixing the last free order to its mean in the map obtained from the preceding fit.

Parameters

  • polydeg – Degree of the fitting polynomial. Must be >= 0.

  • suffix – Phase maps hdf5 file suffix (added before the extension .hdf5)

  • high_order_phase – Phase vector removed before fitting. Must be an orb.fft.Phase instance.

Returns

Path to the last phase maps file (can then be opened with PhaseMaps).

polyfit(polydeg, coeffs=None, suffix=None, high_order_phase=None)¶

Create phase maps from a polynomial fit of the binned phase cube

Parameters

  • polydeg – Degree of the fitting polynomial. Must be >= 0.

  • coeffs – Used to fix some coefficients to a given value. If not None, must be a list of length = polydeg + 1. set a coeff to a np.nan or a None to let the parameter free. Each coefficient can also be a map (like the one returned by PhaseMaps.get_map()).

  • suffix – Phase maps hdf5 file suffix (added before the extension .hdf5)

  • high_order_phase – Phase vector removed before fitting. Must be an orb.fft.Phase instance.

Returns

Path to the phase maps file (can then be opened with PhaseMaps).
